title: Riot Support Ticket
body: Not trying to rush anything, but it's been quite a bit since I've submitted my support ticket. Not sure if this is because of crowds of tickets being sent as well, or just another reason, but I'm just wondering on average, how long will the support ticket take to reach staff? Thanks for any replies/reads.

replies.body:
The most recent ticket I'm seeing looks like it was answered on Monday actually! Be sure to check your email, or open the ticket on the support site. 

To answer the question tho, typically the NA response time is about 12-14~ hours.
